Articles.Content: I want to make a planet pack mod but dont know how to use Kittopia Tech or Kopernicus to commence it. How do I?
This is really a Kopernicus question-- you'd probably do better to post in the Kopernicus forum thread.

8 hours ago, drekerb42 said:

I want to make a planet pack mod but dont know how to use Kittopia Tech or Kopernicus to commence it. How do I?

You sit down and learn how Kopernicus and KittopiaTech work, ideally.

I don't mean this sarcastically either - making KSP swallow additional celestial bodies is hard, and therefore, you need dedicated tools to do it. And to use these tools, you must study them. On the upside, doing basic stuff in Kopernicus is not hard at all; you can probably figure it out yourself just by downloading an existing planet pack and looking at the configs it ships. But be prepared to encounter step after step after step afterwards where you want to do more and end up having to ask or do research again.
Thread moved to the modding subforum.

1 hour ago, Vanamonde said:

Thread moved to the modding subforum. 

Thank you!
